channel.title: Omg can someone clever please help me!
channel.description: HOW DO I UPDATE MY SERVER!!!! I HAVE CHANGED THE NPCS IN MY SERVER!!! BUT HOW DO I MAKE IT ACTIVE??? ::update 5 doesn't work.. -.-

item.title: Omg can someone clever please help me!
item.dc:creator: @1m_3m0 1m 3m0
item.description:
@1m_3m0 wrote:

ok in your source what ever source it may be theres a compiler after you make changes to your server information say in client or npc or auto spawn or stuff liek that you save what you have done (obviously) then you go to your compiler and double click then you choose compile and when it’s done if you have errors you go and fix them and if you dont have errors you run the server and then what ever changes you have made on the server they will be there…

Read full topic

item.description:
@1m_3m0 wrote:

did u change the npc’s in auto spawn? and if you did do you have a working compiler? if you do, you just have to compile it
if you dont have a compiler mod taharok has a perfect compiler in the tut list.
